about_the_game:
The ideal addition for your industrial empire. The digital supporter pack from Industry Giant 4.0 contains digital extras that will make your business easier and should not be missing in any industrial mogul's office. Look forward to an extensive Tech Tree as a wallpaper and a calendar for the coming business year 2025!

Tech Tree
Which industry do I need for which goods? How can I link production sensibly and efficiently? The lovingly designed Tech Tree offers you all this and much more at a glance. Everything within reach - a manager's heart will rejoice!

Calendar 2025
A successful business year needs to be well planned! And what could be more fun than a beautifully designed calendar? Your industries will accompany you throughout the year!

How to access the Digital Goodies
All digital goodies can be found in the game's install directory within the folder ‘’Digital Supporter Pack‘’ (Steam\SteamApps\common\Industry Giant 4.0) after the ‘Digital Supporter Pack’ DLC has finished downloading.
